Package org.teamfarce.mirch.entities

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    tileLocation
    A interface for all objects that require to be positioned on the map in terms of tiles
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPerson
    Created by brookehatton on 01/02/2017.
    AbstractPerson.PersonPositionComparator
    This class is to sort a list of AbstractPerson in highest Y coordinate to lowest Y coordinate It is used to render NPCs and the Player in the correct order to avoid it appearing as though someone is standing on top of someone else
    Clue
    This class defines the clues that the player needs to find in order to solve the murder.
    MapEntity
    Base class to represent different map entities.
    Player
    Created by brookehatton on 31/01/2017.
    PlayerController
    This class allows the player to be moved and controlled.
    Suspect
    Stores information about a single suspect character.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractPerson.PersonState
    The state of the person explains what they are currently doing.
    Direction
    Created by brookehatton on 02/02/2017.
